message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $10,000. I believe it holds significant value for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Would you be willing to accept this price?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $7,000 is significantly below its value. I could meet you halfway at $8,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $7,500?
